title: Wildflowers
lyrics:
Sunshine
Coming in thru
The open window
Of my bedroom
Wildflowers

At the side of the road

Caught my eye

And turned my heart to stone



Hey man, are you OK

That was all that I heard

Somebody say



Wildflowers

I am shy with a song

Totally devastated

For so long



Wildflowers

I am lost in a dream

Why are we still pretending

To believe
